definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: I could tell he was dying to drive that car.
sentences.chinese: 我能看出来他是铁了心要开那辆车。

sentences.english: Clever animals like foxes may even plot revenge with single- minded determination.
sentences.chinese: 一些像狐狸这样聪明的动物甚至会铁了心地设计复仇。

sentences.english: We are going to finish this project come hell or high water.
sentences.chinese: 我们是铁了心要完成这项计划的。

sentences.english: This iron the heart was done, not sedulous also ground does what SEO.
sentences.chinese: 这回铁了心搞了，也不刻意地搞啥SEO了。

sentences.english: Although (she is)determined about further education, she is still concerned about money.
sentences.chinese: 尽管她铁了心要去进修，她还是担心钱的问题。

sentences.english: Committed savers are those not afraid to go for the best deal.
sentences.chinese: 如果你铁了心要做一个节省狂，那就别害怕砍价到底。

sentences.english: The trustees decided that they really wanted a "Sunflowers".
sentences.chinese: 理事会铁了心坚持要买一幅“向日葵”。

sentences.english: Dargis is sure to make a move on the cat.
sentences.chinese: 达吉斯是铁了心要除掉那猫了。

sentences.english: Look TOM is iron the heart comes with the train of thought of media operation electron business affairs.
sentences.chinese: 看来TOM是铁了心以媒体的思路来运营电子商务了。

sentences.english: Becomes useful is ate steelyard Tuo iron heart.
sentences.chinese: 赵成材是吃了秤砣铁了心了。

definition: to be determined to/to insist on
life or death/fate/no matter what/anyway/for the life of me
lit. either the fish dies or the net splits/a life and death struggle (idiom)
see 撕破臉|撕破脸[si1 po4 lian3]
to leave the matter at that/to be prepared to let go/to be willing to take things lying down
to hold on firmly/to cling (to a belief)/stubbornly
obstinately clinging to one's course (idiom)/willful/one's own way/dogmatic
to let go of sth held in one's mouth/(fig.) to relent/to yield
to have an acrimonious falling-out/to shed all pretense of cordiality/to tear into each other
